0.0: "A man's wife is matched in accordance with his deeds" — A modest woman for a righteous man, a promiscuous woman for an evil man.

1.0: Gemula: Separated, as in, "And he was weaned (vayigamel)" (Genesis 21:8).

0.0: Eshkolot- until their days there was never a dispute (machloket) among the sages of Israel. They all would say things [exactly] as they were given to Moses at Sinai and they were the first to dispute...this was the first dispute among Israel on the words of the Torah.
